quote: Do for this life as if you live forever, do for the afterlife as if you die tomorrow.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib

quote: A man's measure is his will.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib

quote: Hide the good you do, and make known the good done to you.
author: Imam Ali

quote: Knowledge is the root of all good.
author: Imam Ali

quote: When you are angry, Be silent.
author: Prophet Muhammad (S.A.W)

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: We carry within us the wonders we seek around.
author: Jalāl ad-Dīn Muhammad Rūmī

quote: The best revenge is to improve yourself
author: Imam Ali

quote: Respond to every call that excites your spirit
author: Jalāl ad-Dīn Muhammad Rūmī
